title: cafter
author: cafter
content: I or we need to check crypto addresses many times ,But many times i get right information about addresses and sometimes there is no information available or wrong information available,anyone please tell me the best bitcoin explorer which is very accurate and provide many many information without much ads,

comments.author: Apocollapse
comments.body: What's the point to check crypto addresses for many times? if you think your crypto isn't in a safe place, it's better for you to move it to hardware wallet.The reason why there's no information available or wrong information, it might you're check the address to quick before the transaction is confirmed. I suggest you to use blockchair since it's the most accurate crypto explorer and you can use Tor too for increase your privacy.

comments.author: lassdas
comments.body: Everyone has different tastes and preferences, so to tell "the best" is always a tricky task,but maybe you can find one you like here -> List of useful Bitcoin block explorers

comments.author: Accardo
comments.body: Quote from: cafter on March 01, 2023, 10:00:13 AMI or we need to check crypto addresses many times ,But many times i get right information about addresses and sometimes there is no information available or wrong information available,anyone please tell me the best bitcoin explorer which is very accurate and provide many many information without much ads,I think you'll get better answers to your question if you specified the reason behind the post. Do you check the address many time to know if the money has been sent? Or you check to confirm if the address sent to you is receiving money for the first time? I mean, what kind of information do you have a keen eye on when looking for an explorer? With that the best in that aspect can be recommended to you.  Isn't it?

comments.author: Taskford
comments.body: Quote from: cafter on March 01, 2023, 10:00:13 AMI or we need to check crypto addresses many times ,But many times i get right information about addresses and sometimes there is no information available or wrong information available,anyone please tell me the best bitcoin explorer which is very accurate and provide many many information without much ads,I don't find the need for checking always your address on block explorer not unless if you are always expecting a transaction from many people every day. Maybe the one you need to check is your Bitcoin address if you copy it correctly since there are copy paste malware spreading and your device or hardware might get infected with that so double check always if you paste the right address you use before sending or accepting anything from other people.

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: Are you using a paper wallet or you have a wallet on an airgapped device and not able to check your wallet balance or wallet address balance?  You do not need an explorer for that, you can just go for a watch-only wallet.https://electrum.readthedocs.io/en/latest/coldstorage.htmlRead that guide and know how to set up watch-only wallet. No one can spend from watch-only wallet even if you have it on your device because your master public key or addresses are used to set up the watch-only wallet, it contains no private key that can be used to spend from a wallet.

comments.author: MiliMil
comments.body: Quote from: cafter on March 01, 2023, 10:00:13 AMI or we need to check crypto addresses many times ,But many times i get right information about addresses and sometimes there is no information available or wrong information available,anyone please tell me the best bitcoin explorer which is very accurate and provide many many information without much ads,Is there any particular reason you keep checking your address multiple times?I'm not quite sure I understand the premise of your question.Are you worried about the safety and security of your crypto? If so, I suggest doing what I did and store all your crypto on a cold wallet that isn't connected to the internet.

comments.author: mendace
comments.body: I often read this also in the contents of the Italian community but I don't understand why you always have to check your address or your transaction.  But do you always and often check your money in your bank account?
